title: KODAK PIXPRO AZ255-BK 16MP Digital Camera 25X Optical Zoom 24mm Wide Angle Lens Optical Image Stabilization 1080P Full HD Video 3" LCD Vlogging Camera (Black)
description: Discover the new collection of KODAK PIXPRO Digital Cameras and discover a world of creativity at your fingertips. The AZ255 is the perfect bridge camera to explore your love of photography. Ample mega pixels, 25X optical mega zoom and a wider angle lens than traditional models, this camera could easily become your new best friend. KODAK PIXPRO Digital Cameras - Tell your story.
